忠義量譜

開啟<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>鋼鐵信念<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能後，畫面上會出現顯示該技能發動狀態的量譜。
想要集中仇恨時，建議發動鋼鐵信念。
<UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>職業量譜的說明可以隨時在技能功能表中進行查看。<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
忠義量譜

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>忠義精通<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性後，畫面上會出現專用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>忠義量譜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
該量譜不僅會顯示鋼鐵信念的狀態，還會顯示騎士的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>忠義<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>效果的具體量值。
自動攻擊命中時會累積忠義量值，消耗忠義量值可以發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>盾陣<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、45級學會的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>保護<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和62級學會的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>干預<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
獸魂量譜

開啟<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>防禦者<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能後，畫面上會出現顯示該技能發動狀態的量譜。
想要集中仇恨時，建議發動防禦者。
獸魂量譜

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>獸魂<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性後，畫面上會出現專用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>獸魂量譜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
該量譜不僅會顯示守護的狀態，還會顯示代表戰士心中野性的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>獸魂<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的具體量值。
<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>原初之魂<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和45級學會的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>鋼鐵旋風<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>等技能都需要通過消耗累積的獸魂量值才能發動。
獸魂量值可以通過發動特定的技能進行累積。
暗血量譜

開啟<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>深惡痛絕<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能後，畫面上會出現顯示該技能發動狀態的量譜。
想要集中仇恨時，建議發動深惡痛絕。
暗黑量譜

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑波動<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能後，畫面上會出現專用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑量譜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
暗黑量譜會顯示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的持續時間。發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑波動<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和40級學會的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑鋒<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>可以附加暗黑狀態。
暗黑狀態中自身攻擊所造成的傷害提高。
暗血量譜

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗血<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性後，畫面上會出現專用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗血量譜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
該量譜會顯示暗血的具體量值。<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>血濺<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和64級學會的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>寂滅<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>等技能都需要通過消耗累積的暗血量值才能發動。
暗血量值可以通過發動特定的技能進行累積。
暗黑量譜

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>至黑之夜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能後，暗黑量譜會顯示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗技<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>狀態。
消耗<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>至黑之夜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的防護罩效果可以附加暗技狀態。
附加暗技狀態後，可以通過只消耗暗技不消耗MP的方式來發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑波動<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑鋒<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
暗黑量譜

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>掠影示現<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能後，一同戰鬥的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>英雄的掠影<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>會變成實體。暗黑量譜可以顯示英雄的掠影實體存在的剩餘時間。
百合花莖量譜

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>神秘百合<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性後，畫面上會出現專用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>百合花莖量譜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，
以顯示當前<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>治療百合<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>開花的數量。
當自身處於戰鬥狀態時，每過一定時間就會開放一朵治療百合，
消耗百合可以發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>安慰之心<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和76級學會的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>狂喜之心<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
百合花莖量譜

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>安慰之心效果提高<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性後，百合花莖量譜會顯示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>血百合<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的狀態。發動需要消耗治療百合的技能，可以使血百合逐漸開放。
當血百合完全開放時，即可發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>苦難之心<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
乙太超流量譜

發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>乙太超流<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能後，畫面上會出現專用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>乙太超流量譜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以顯示當前附加的乙太超流量值。
異想量譜

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>乙太契約<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能後，畫面上會出現專用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>異想量譜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以顯示當前小仙女的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>異想乙太<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>量值。在自身處於戰鬥狀態且小仙女處於同行狀態時，發動消耗乙太超流的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>生命活性法<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>深謀遠慮之策<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>等技能可以增加異想乙太量值，累積的異想乙太量值可以用來發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>乙太契約<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
異想量譜

學會並發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>熾天召喚<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能後，可以暫時召喚出<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>熾天使<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>替代朝日小仙女。
異想量譜會顯示熾天使的剩餘存在時間。
奧秘量譜

發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>星極抽卡<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>靈極抽卡<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能後，畫面上會出現專用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>奧秘量譜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以顯示當前抽出的卡片。
同時，<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>出卡I<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>出卡II<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>出卡III<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>會變為對應的奧秘卡，發動這些奧秘卡可以獲得相應的效果。
奧秘量譜/星標

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>小奧秘卡<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能後，奧秘量譜上會顯示抽到的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>小奧秘卡<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
在發動星極抽卡、靈極抽卡技能後，小奧秘卡分別會變為<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>王冠之領主<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>王冠之貴婦<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
鬥氣量譜

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>鐵山鬥氣<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能後，畫面上會出現顯示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>鬥氣<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>累積狀態的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>鬥氣量譜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
鬥氣累積到最大檔時，可以發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>鐵山靠<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和40級學會的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>空鳴拳<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
象形拳量譜

象形拳量譜上會顯示出<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>脈輪<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>陰陽鬥氣<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的賦予狀況。脈輪共有三種，分別為<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>盜龍脈輪<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>猛虎脈輪<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>以及<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>魔猿脈輪<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，發動特定戰技可獲得對應的脈輪。

根據附加的脈輪組合，可以發動三種不同的技能。
附加三種相同的脈輪後，可以發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>蒼氣砲<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
附加三種不同的脈輪後，可以發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>爆裂腳<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
不分種類附加三種脈輪後，可以發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>翻天腳<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。

此外，發動蒼氣砲後將會附加<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>太陰鬥氣<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，發動爆裂腳後將會附加<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>太陽鬥氣<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，
在此基礎上不分種類再次附加三種脈輪，可以發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>鬥魂旋風腳<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
疾風迅雷量譜

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>義結金蘭<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
發動義結金蘭，為自身與周圍隊員附加<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>義結金蘭：鬥氣<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>狀態，
<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>義結金蘭：鬥氣<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>狀態中，<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>鬥氣<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>最大等階增加至10階。
龍血量譜

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>武神槍<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能後，畫面上會出現專用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>龍血量譜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以顯示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>蒼天龍血<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的剩餘持續時間。
發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>武神槍<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>會進入<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>蒼天龍血<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>狀態，該狀態下攻擊所造成的傷害提高。
龍血量譜

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>長槍精通IV<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性後，在每次發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>龍眼雷電<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>以及<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>龍眼蒼天<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>時都會賦予一檔<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>天龍眼<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
當天龍眼累積到最大等階時，可以發動<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>天龍點睛<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
風纏量譜

學會<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>強甲破點突<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能後，畫面上會出現專用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>風纏量譜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以顯示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>風纏<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的累積狀態。
強甲破點突連擊成功時獲得<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>風纏<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，最多5階，消耗風纏可以提升<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>旋風刃<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的威力。
